post.desc:
Now I'm imagining those mochi mallets both Earth and Moon rabbits use to actually be rifles, with the head doubling as both the stock and the magazine (or the receiver that the magazine goes into)

And Seiran says this to [**Reimu in LoLK.**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Legacy_of_Lunatic_Kingdom/Story/Marisa's_Scenario#:~:text=しょうがないから)
